content: Is the $document operation with 'persist' and 'id' really considered an idempotent operation? It is subject to change the state server side as it can overwrite a previous composition with the same 'id' given that the referenced entries have been updated in the meantime ... or am I missing something here?
It would produce a new Bundle instance with a new Bundle.id. It wouldn't touch the Composition at all.
My mistake - I had a wrong perception of the operation
